name: Goldf
description:
NOTE: if you get stuck, try reloading the page!

Goldf is an endless subterranean golfing simulator. You are tasked with transferring gold nuggets from underground caverns into a hole in the fabric of reality using nothing more but a golf club.

The levels are randomly generated but they are (or should be!) the same for everyone. If you're familiar with Desert Golfing or Golf on Mars, you know how it works. Have fun!

Controls: WASD/arrows + mouse. Press M to mute music.

Made by Antti Tiihonen in 48h for Ludum Dare 48 game jam.
